room_title: Escape room "Under Pressure" by Escapology Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: If you're looking for something really fun to do and haven't tried an escape room yet, I highly recommend it. We had the best time escaping from the Under Pressure submarine-themed rooms. The rooms are clean and interesting and will challenge you, but the awesome staff will help you as well if you need a hint or two. Fabulous activity for a group of six or eight to do. Haven't had this much fun in a while.

room_title: Escape room "Under Pressure" by Escapology Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: Fun time!!!! It was difficult, well organized.it was very clean. I would recommend it. Start with a lower rated room to build up your confidence.

room_title: Escape room "Under Pressure" by Escapology Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: Under Pressure escape room was an absolute blast. Our team made it out with 2 seconds to spare. Give this room or any the others a try, I think you will have lots of fun we did!
